title: Australia blasts big tech for child sexual abuse failings
desc: Australia’s online safety regulator blasted major technology companies including Meta Platforms Inc, Apple Inc and Google for failing to stamp out child sexual exploitation and abuse on their services.

title: Man who tried to shoot Trump at Florida golf course gets life in prison
desc: A man sentenced to life for attempting to assassinate Trump at a Florida golf course faces life in prison.

title: A newborn's death likely linked to the mom drinking raw milk while pregnant
desc: Health officials in New Mexico have said a newborn baby died from a listeria infection likely linked to the child’s mother drinking raw milk during pregnancy

title: dollar tech wipeout ensnares all stocks in AI’s path
desc: There have been many AI-driven selloffs in the three years since ChatGPT burst into the mainstream. Nothing, though, quite rivals the rout rippling through stock and credit markets this week.

title: AI Learns To Recommend Medicines Even For Patients With No Prescription History
desc: Researchers have developed MetaDrug, a new framework leveraging both a patient’s medical history and data from similar patients to provide personalised medication recommendations even when limited prior prescription data is available.

title: S’pore pledges to keep supply chains resilient as US proposes critical minerals bloc to counter China
desc: The US proposes a critical minerals trade bloc with allies to secure supply chains, reducing dependence and countering China's market dominance. Read more at straitstimes.com.

title: Not just Naravane: 19-yr-old case shadows ex-officer’s book on R&AW ‘secrets’
desc: The General is not alone. There are other senior Army officers who have risked publishing tell-all books after their retirement. And paid a heavy price for it.
